Stern School of Business, and Steinhardt School of Culture, Education, and Human Development:                  College of Arts and Science      Connect to the CAS Course Evaluation Guide .                      Global Academic Centers      View course evaluation results from courses offered at NYU's Global Academic Centers.                      Leonard N. Stern School of Business      Connect to the Course Faculty Evaluations webpage on the Stern Web Information System (AIS).     This page allows students with access to AIS to view course evaluation data for undergraduate and graduate courses. Only students currently enrolled in Stern courses have access to AIS.                      Steinhardt School of Culture, Education, and Human Development      Connect to the Steinhardt Course Evaluation Guide .      If you have evaluations to complete, click here .                                                 Unless otherwise noted, all content copyright New York University. All rights reserved.
